trans-unit.source:
<MadCap:annotation MadCap:createDate="2018-05-14T14:52:11.8509805-05:00" MadCap:creator="NTadajewski0100" MadCap:initials="NT" MadCap:comment="Per Torsten email on 5/14/2018
I learned today that we should add a note to chapter 6.4. Sprue Bush. One of our colleagues complaints that the sprue bush weight is not calculated for BOMs and only for recipes. To prevent such misleading approaches, we should a corresponding note to our PM manual. 


EN: Note: Sprue Bush is calculated for components used in recipes. The calculation is not supported for components of Production BOM.

German: Anmerkung: Die Berechnung des Angusses erfolgt nur für Komponenten einer Rezeptur. Die Berechnung erfolgt nicht für Komponenten einer Fertigungsstückliste.
" MadCap:editor="NTadajewski0100" MadCap:editDate="2018-05-14T14:53:20.8499237-05:00" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Sprue Bush</MadCap:annotation>

mrk.bpt:
<MadCap:annotation MadCap:createDate="2018-05-14T14:52:11.8509805-05:00" MadCap:creator="NTadajewski0100" MadCap:initials="NT" MadCap:comment="Per Torsten email on 5/14/2018
I learned today that we should add a note to chapter 6.4. Sprue Bush. One of our colleagues complaints that the sprue bush weight is not calculated for BOMs and only for recipes. To prevent such misleading approaches, we should a corresponding note to our PM manual. 


EN: Note: Sprue Bush is calculated for components used in recipes. The calculation is not supported for components of Production BOM.

German: Anmerkung: Die Berechnung des Angusses erfolgt nur für Komponenten einer Rezeptur. Die Berechnung erfolgt nicht für Komponenten einer Fertigungsstückliste.
" MadCap:editor="NTadajewski0100" MadCap:editDate="2018-05-14T14:53:20.8499237-05:00" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">

trans-unit.source: The following points are relevant when explaining sprue bush weight:

seg-source.mrk: The following points are relevant when explaining sprue bush weight:

trans-unit.source: Raw material consumption is dependent on the tool

seg-source.mrk: Raw material consumption is dependent on the tool

trans-unit.source: Raw materials requirements must be considered

seg-source.mrk: Raw materials requirements must be considered

trans-unit.source: Raw material costs must be considered

seg-source.mrk: Raw material costs must be considered

trans-unit.source: If changing a tool, a recalculation of the sprue bush is needed

seg-source.mrk: If changing a tool, a recalculation of the sprue bush is needed

trans-unit.source: Possible dependence between machine and tool

seg-source.mrk: Possible dependence between machine and tool

trans-unit.source: The Sprue Bush Weight for each tool can be specified on the Tool FastTab of the Tool Work Center Card.

seg-source.mrk: The Sprue Bush Weight for each tool can be specified on the Tool FastTab of the Tool Work Center Card.

trans-unit.source: : Sprue Bush Weight specified on the W004 tool

seg-source.mrk: : Sprue Bush Weight specified on the W004 tool

trans-unit.source: As with the other fields on this FastTab, the sprue bush weight is transferred to the Work Center Prod. Rate Card page where it can be customized for each work center.

seg-source.mrk: As with the other fields on this FastTab, the sprue bush weight is transferred to the <span class="Bold">Work Center Prod.
Rate Card page where it can be customized for each work center.

trans-unit.source: : Sprue Bush Weight transferred from Tool W004 to Work Center Prod. Rate Card for work center M003

seg-source.mrk: : Sprue Bush Weight transferred from Tool W004 to Work Center Prod.
Rate Card for work center M003

trans-unit.source: The value entered in the Weight Unit of Measure field on the Process Manufacturing Setup page ensures that the sprue bush weight and the item are calculated using the same unit of measure.

seg-source.mrk: The value entered in the Weight Unit of Measure field on the Process Manufacturing Setup page ensures that the sprue bush weight and the item are calculated using the same unit of measure.

trans-unit.source: In addition to ensuring the correct calculation, the Weight Unit of Measure field must be filled in because the sprue bush weight from the tool must be converted into a percentage for the raw materials in the component lines of the production order. This is due to the increasing amount of raw materials because of the scrap %.

seg-source.mrk: In addition to ensuring the correct calculation, the Weight Unit of Measure field must be filled in because the sprue bush weight from the tool must be converted into a percentage for the raw materials in the component lines of the production order.
This is due to the increasing amount of raw materials because of the scrap %.
